replies.msg:
兩個月了。
這兩個月過得很漫長。
可說是對香港人來說最艱難，痛苦，絕望，憤怒，無助的時刻。

但慶幸的是，香港人又大幅度進化了。
在此要多謝香港政府𣎴斷地叫醒裝睡的你我他。

但還未完，
我們要繼續捍衛屬於香港的核心價值，對抗極權到底。

These 2-month has been the most difficult and toughest period for Hong Kong people ever.

Loads of sadness, desperation, disappointment and anger.
Thanks to the HKSAR government.

However, we, Hong Kong people, have drastically evolved. A big step forward.

It's not yet ended.
We have to protect our core values and fight against the tyranny.

https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=2375068689246607&id=178965725523592
